title: Group portrait of one boy, one girl, two men, including smiling groom wearing moustache, dark necktie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, standing with two women, including bride in center smiling wearing tiara with mid length veil, and light colored off the shoulder wedding dress with scalloped edge and ruched bodice, holding bouquet of flowers with large light colored ribbon, posed in interior with rug, floral wallpaper, floral armchair on right, and windows with light colored blinds and curtains, possibly on Chance Street in Hazelwood
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
